trans-unit.source: Represents an entity reference node.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en enhet referanse node.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlEntityReference"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlEntityReference"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Do not instantiate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference> directly; instead, use methods such as <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateEntityReference%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ikke starte en <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference>direkte; i stedet bruke metoder for eksempel <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateEntityReference%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateEntityReference%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference>

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity reference; see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference.Name*> property.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på enhetsreferansen; Se den <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference.Name*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The parent XML document.
trans-unit.target: Det overordnede XML-dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the base Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Henter den grunnleggende Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places.
trans-unit.target: Et nettverk XML-dokument består av tilgjengelig, aggregeres med ulike World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) standard inkluderings mekanismer, og derfor inneholder noder som kommer fra ulike steder.

trans-unit.source: The `BaseURI` tells you where these nodes came from.
trans-unit.target: Den `BaseURI` forteller hvor disse nodene kom fra.

trans-unit.source: If there is no base URI for the nodes being returned (maybe they were parsed from an in-memory string), <xref:System.String> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen basis-URIEN for noder som returneres (kanskje de ble analysert fra en streng i minnet), <xref:System.String>returneres.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: `BaseURI` walks the node tree looking for entity reference boundaries, so if entities are expanded, this information is not preserved and this property returns the location of the XmlDocument in all cases.
trans-unit.target: `BaseURI`leder noden treet ser etter enheten referanse grensene, så hvis enheter utvides, denne informasjonen ikke opprettholdes og denne egenskapen returnerer plasseringen for XmlDocument i alle tilfellene.

trans-unit.source: For additional information on `BaseURI` and how it behaves with other node types, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.BaseURI%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om `BaseURI` og hvordan det fungerer med andre typer, kan du se <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.BaseURI%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.BaseURI%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The location from which the node was loaded.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen som noden ble lastet inn fra.

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et duplikat av denne noden.

trans-unit.source: This method serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fungerer som en kopi konstruktør for noder.

trans-unit.source: The cloned node has no parent (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`).
trans-unit.target: Det klonede har ingen overordnede (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returnerer `null`).</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til rekursivt klone undertreet under den angitte noden. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til klone noden seg selv.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlEntityReference" name="XmlEntityReference" href=""></xref> nodes, this method always returns an entity reference node with no children.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlEntityReference" name="XmlEntityReference" href=""> </xref> noder metoden returnerer alltid en enhet referanse node uten underordnede objekter.

trans-unit.source: The replacement text is set when the node is inserted into a parent.
trans-unit.target: Den nye teksten er angitt når noden settes inn i en overordnet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned node.
trans-unit.target: Klonede noden.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om noden er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: A read-only node is one whose properties, attributes, or children cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: En skrivebeskyttet node er en der egenskapene attributter eller underordnede ikke kan endres.

trans-unit.source: However, you can remove a read-only node from the tree and insert it somewhere else.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid fjerne en skrivebeskyttet node fra treet og sett den et annet sted.

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the node is read-only; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis noden er skrivebeskyttet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlEntityReference" name="XmlEntityReference" href=""></xref> nodes are read-only, this property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlEntityReference" name="XmlEntityReference" href=""> </xref> noder er skrivebeskyttet, denne egenskapen returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the local name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter den lokale noden.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlEntityReference" name="XmlEntityReference" href=""></xref> nodes, this property returns the name of the entity referenced.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlEntityReference" name="XmlEntityReference" href=""> </xref> noder egenskapen returnerer navnet på enheten refererer til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på noden.

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity referenced.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på enheten refererer til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter av noden.

trans-unit.source: The node type.
trans-unit.target: Nodetypen.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlEntityReference" name="XmlEntityReference" href=""></xref> nodes, the value is XmlNodeType.EntityReference.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlEntityReference" name="XmlEntityReference" href=""> </xref> noder verdien er XmlNodeType.EntityReference.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the node.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for noden.

trans-unit.source: The value of the node.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for noden.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlEntityReference" name="XmlEntityReference" href=""></xref> nodes, this property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlEntityReference" name="XmlEntityReference" href=""> </xref> noder denne egenskapen returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Noden er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Setting the property.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Saves all the children of the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer alle underordnede av noden for den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> som du ønsker å lagre.

trans-unit.source: Saves the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer noden på den angitte <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en Microsoft-filtype til dokumentet objektet Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> som du ønsker å lagre.
